title: SMTP Host
description: SMTP host to send emails with

title: SMTP Port
description: Port used to connect to the SMTP server when sending out emails

title: SMTP use SSL
description: Whether to use Secure Sockets Layer when connecting to the SMTP Servers

title: SMTP auth user
description: The email address that will be used to send out emails with. This includes internal notifications, booking inquiries and critical user actions.

title: SMTP auth password
description: The password that will be used when authenticating to the SMTP server each time the system sends out an email. This has to match with the email provided above.

title: Hot Page Reload
description: Eliminate page reload by serving content through Stellium's Hot Page Reload Module

messages.description: Hot Page Reload is an experimental feature. This feature may break some website functionality if the theme does not support the hot reload module.
